description: K/DA is a popular all-female K-pop group composed of Kai'Sa, Ahri, Seraphine, Akali, and Evelynn.  Their manager, a sex offender, is instrumental to their success, leading to complex dynamics within the group.  While the girls initially see their manager as a lonely man seeking connection, their interactions with him involve sexual favors and group orgies to maintain their career.
stateReason: The description contains details of illegal activities (sexual exploitation of minors) involving the characters and their manager. This requires further investigation and moderation.
